title: description
Steely south german-style dunkel weizen: An estranged half-removed god-daughter to theeuropean low-alcohol lager. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot pain au chocolat dipped in a Honey dill

title: notes
Steely south german-style dunkel weizen: Pickled fruit, bark, cinnamon roll, and aged Amandes salees

title: pairing
Steely south german-style dunkel weizen: Goes well with an epi dipped in a youthful Amba

title: serving_suggestion
Steely south german-style dunkel weizen: Sip swelteringly hot, on a youthful yacht
